XNAT Connection API¶

class xnat_wrapper.connector.Connector(**kwargs)¶

Class that provides methods to connect to an XNAT instance. Either pass the config parameter by itself or pass each of the server, user, and password parameters.

Parameters

  • config (str) – The name of the XNAT login config file

  • server (str) – The XNAT server IP address

  • user (str) – The username for the XNAT session

  • password (str) – The password for the XNAT session

  • project (str, optional) – The name of an XNAT project

__init__(**kwargs)¶

Constructor method

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

close_session()¶

Disconnects from the current XNAT session

initialize_session(**login)¶

Creates an XNAT interface that can be used to interact with projects, sessions, and scans.

Parameters

login (dict) – A dictionary containing a config file or server, user, and password

set_project(project)¶

Sets the project for entire XNAT connection (importer and command utilites included).

Parameters

project (str) – The name of the XNAT project
